vclaim: A signature audit of absentee ballots in Georgia must be conducted and could overturn the 2020 presidential vote results in that state.
title: Debunking Trump Tweets: Should Georgia Conduct a Ballot Signature Audit?
subtitle: It’s unlikely the Georgia Secretary of State’s office will further examine absentee voter signatures or alter their state's ballot totals in 2020.
author: David Mikkelson
